name: illegible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of writing or print) impossible or almost impossible to read because of being very untidy or not clear: His writing is almost illegible. Opposite
legibleSynonym
unreadable

(of writing or print) impossible or difficult to read because it is unclear: illegible handwriting
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe writing or text that is impossible to read because the letters are not clear, the text is printed badly, etc.: Incomplete or illegible claim forms will be deemed invalid. Compare
legible
